Company: HCA, Inc. Hospital Corporation of America
Description of incident: 10 computers containing              Medicare and Medicaid billing information and records of employees              and physicians from 1996-2006 were stolen from one of the company's              regional offices. Some patient names and SSNs were exposed, but details              are vague. Records for patients in hospitals in the following states              were affected: CO, KS, LA, MS, OK, OR, TS, WA.
